content: Riverbank Generating Station provides 300 MW via hydroelectric turbines. Scheduled maintenance in March.
metadata: Plant code: RBC-12, capacity: 300 MW, region: North District

content: Sunrise Solar Farm yields 150 MW on peak days. Battery storage pilot ongoing.
metadata: Farm code: SSF-07, region: West District, pilot started 2025-01

content: Eastside Natural Gas Plant, 500 MW. High capacity factor, older turbines needing upgrade in 2026.
metadata: Plant code: ENG-33, region: East District, last overhaul: 2024-05

content: GreenHill Wind Farm with 120 turbines. Annual output ~400 GWh. Blade inspections scheduled Q2.
metadata: Farm code: GWF-19, region: Central District, property lease until 2030

content: Valley Coal Power Station, 250 MW. Gradual decommission planned over 3 years due to emission targets.
metadata: Plant code: VCP-55, region: South District, shutdown steps: 2026-2028
